column2: she was ready to leave. She put on her darkest coat
column3: a large box of matches already in her pocket
column4: and tied a scarf over her head.|The Private Patient|P.D. James

column1: 02:40|Miss Conover told investigators that at 2:40 a.m.
column2: Officer Martin Willis entered the diner and ordered coffee and donut.|The Andromeda Strain|Michael Crichton
